author: Daniel340
title: Great hotel in good location
text:
Great boutique hotel!
Biggest pros:
- comparably large rooms with up-to-date bathroom
- rooms are very well isolated so great for anyone with a light sleep
- we got an upgrade and a room to the inside patio so it was super quite
- great service, esp. in the breakfast room (Luigi, Fabrizio, Juan Carlos)
- well connected (just across the street from the airport bus stop at Rimini) and possible to walk almost anywhere
- Minor con: only thing I would improve is increasing the breakfast buffet to include more healthy options (whole grain bread, sugar-free yoghurt), but its on par with other comparable hotels
